products.name: Cash ISA
products.description:
Save up to £20,000 tax-free each year with our competitive Cash ISA rates.

  • Tax-free interest
  • Easy access to your money
  • No fees or charges
  • Annual allowance: £20,000

products.name: Stocks & Shares ISA
products.description:
Invest up to £20,000 tax-free each year in a diversified portfolio of ETFs.

  • Tax-free growth potential
  • Diversified investment portfolio
  • Low-cost ETF investing
  • Annual allowance: £20,000

products.name: Lifetime ISA
products.description:
Save for your first home or retirement with a 25% government bonus on contributions up to £4,000 per year.

  • 25% government bonus
  • Use for first home or retirement
  • Annual contribution limit: £4,000
  • Available ages 18-39

products.name: Junior ISA
products.description:
Start saving for your child's future with tax-free growth up to £9,000 per year.

  • Tax-free savings for children
  • Available until age 18
  • Annual allowance: £9,000
  • Child gets access at 18

products.name: Personal Pension
products.description:
Build your retirement pot with tax relief on contributions and investment growth.

  • Tax relief on contributions
  • Flexible contribution options
  • Diversified investment portfolio
  • Access from age 55

products.name: Simple Saver
products.description:
Easy access savings account with competitive interest rates and no fees.

  • Instant access to your money
  • Competitive interest rates
  • No minimum balance
  • No monthly fees

products.name: 32 Day Notice Account
products.description:
Higher interest savings account with 32 days notice required for withdrawals.

  • Higher interest rates
  • 32 day notice period
  • No fees or charges
  • Minimum balance: £1

products.name: 95 Day Notice Account
products.description:
Premium savings account offering our highest interest rates with 95 days notice.

  • Premium interest rates
  • 95 day notice period
  • No fees or charges
  • Minimum balance: £1

products.name: General Investment Account
products.description:
Invest in a diversified portfolio of ETFs without annual contribution limits.

  • No annual contribution limits
  • Diversified ETF portfolio
  • Low management fees
  • Flexible withdrawals
